title: This new Best Buy program lets you lease a MacBook
description: Mac users in the U.S. can now upgrade their MacBooks thanks to a new program BestBuy offers, called Upgrade+. It’s essentially like a car lease, but for a Mac.

title: This new Philips monitor is an ultra-bright mini-LED gaming beast
description: Philips has just announced the arrival of its new Evnia gaming brand, starting with an impressive mini-LED monitor.

title: World Cup soccer fans determined to enjoy games in style
description: Qatar's small size means accommodation is tight for next month's World Cup, but some moneyed fans are determined to enjoy the sporting extravaganza in style.
